last_episode_to_air.name: Accidents Happen
last_episode_to_air.overview: Deusa enjoys her success, but Tadeu is less than thrilled. Eva contemplates two enticing career opportunities as she learns the truth about her mother.

name: Only for Love
overview: Deusa’s solo career puts her romance with Tadeu to the test. Eva wants a great artist to sing her lyrics. Soon, their musical dreams collide.

episodes.name: No Goodbye, No Farewell
episodes.overview: Eva’s dream is on the verge of coming true when she plays for a famous singer, but a tragedy swiftly gets in the way. Meanwhile, doors open for Deusa.

episodes.name: My Own Boss
episodes.overview: Eva goes to radio personality Alex Fernão with a proposition. César Marcolo falls out with Ana Lígia over Deusa, who has a choice to make.

episodes.name: I Loved You, But You Didn't Love Me
episodes.overview: Deusa works on her first single at the studio while Roberta goes to an audition. An unexpected visitor surprises Eva at home.

episodes.name: Exclusivity
episodes.overview: Nelton surprises his girlfriend with a cute proposal. While Deusa's solo career gains momentum, a furious Alex voids his arrangement with Eva.

episodes.name: As If You Were Over Me
episodes.overview: Eva sees an opportunity to introduce herself to César. After taking a risk during a gig in São Paulo, Deusa tries to make amends with Tadeu.

episodes.name: Accidents Happen
episodes.overview: Deusa enjoys her success, but Tadeu is less than thrilled. Eva contemplates two enticing career opportunities as she learns the truth about her mother.
